description:
From alpine trails with no shade in sight, to sunny days on the water, these dark shades deliver protection and style. Inspired by sunnies of decades past, the Tera have a classic profile with a few modern updates.

  • Darker than your standard sunnies, but not as dark as true glacier glasses, the Terra thrive in very bright conditions
  • Polarized lenses cut through reflections, great for use around water, snow, pavement and anywhere else glare lies in wait
  • Recycled plastic frames are strong and light
  • Grippy rubber nose pads
  • Removable magnetic side shields offer extra protection from reflected light and light coming in from the side
  • 4-base curvature provides a slight wrap while staying more stylish than sporty
  • Packaging contains no single use plastic
  • Semi-hard case and microfibre bag included
  • Sunski is part of 1% for the planet
  • Sunski found its inspiration from an Australian surf trip, with the goal of making quality sunnies affordable
  • Medium fit sunnies that work best on small to medium faces
name: Sunski Tera Sunglasses - Unisex
